name: Reviewspotter
overview:
What is ReviewSpotter? Customer reviews are a vital resource when trying to decide whether to purchase from a merchant online. The exciting new technology developed by ReviewSpotter eliminates the tedious task of performing internet searches and wasting hours hopping from one site to another in an attempt to find feedback by fellow consumers. ReviewSpotter helps save you time, energy, and potential aggravation by gathering helpful customer testimonials in one convenient location on the stores website. The newly released ReviewSpotter service searches for and displays authentic customer testimonials about participating stores, enabling you to complete your purchase with more confidence.

ReviewSpotter simplifies the process of purchasing items online, allowing you to shop with the same comfort and ease as you would in an actual store. Nothing provides more insight as to the service one should expect from a retailer or service provider than a rating or review by past customers. This allows for informed decision-making and minimal frustration.

When a merchant subscribes to ReviewSpotter, a custom built search engine is used to find past and current reviews from every advertising outlet online. It then sends the reviews directly onto a scrolling flash widget for the buyer to read.

Look for the Reviewspotter badge the next time you’re shopping online to make your experience as simple and pleasant as possible.
